idea:
Since we understand that just learning won't be enough, we also tend to be with our students to consult them for their Career to make it even more splendid. We claim to have the most significant connections in the Tech Industry & out there in all the Commercial sectors to help you initiate your career, which in itself makes us different from any other Portal you will ever come across

The point of difference we plot is about the consistency in derivating Industry-relevant Courses. This also ensures the quality in terms of Understanding the Technical part so that the students can recollect anytime and at the same time confidently write their Exams & face interviews.

We at Ekeeda, make a push with calculated efforts to enhance our dedicated Video Courses exclusively shot for Engineering Students. It includes Online Lectures & Tutorials for Curriculum & Professional Courses.
name: EKEEDA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: An online platform for creative freelancers to connect with customers/ agencies and vice versa. The opportunity for all the talented who will have an opportunity to work at their own convenience. Students, retired professionals, those on sabbatical, this would be chance to get back to mainstream without compromising on your life's priorities. Likewise for organisations they have an access to a great pool of creative talent directly, without paying a high cost to an agency.
name: freepublik

idea:
I take this liberty to give you a snap shot of our start-up venture called as ‘Money24x7’ is the one-stop mobile based app for all the financial needs including investments, loans and insurance founded by a passionate group of entrepreneurs and IIIT alumni
We are currently in BETA phase of testing our Mutual Fund Distribution Android platform and will be launching the same in few weeks for public use.
We have tie-ups and certifications from across the financial entities including all the AMCs, BSE, AMFI regulatory board, and RTAs including CAMS, KARVY etc.
We have empanelled both offline and online with all major Asset Management Companies (AMC’s) for mutual fund distribution and partnership with Mahindra Finance Ltd. (NBFC) for fixed deposits
Brand Name - Money24x7
